<!--- Configuration --->
```{r}
year <- "2018"
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
sites <- c()
files <- list.files("data/trees", pattern=paste0("*", year, ".csv"), recursive=TRUE, full.names=TRUE)

for(file in files){
  sites <- c(sites, unlist(strsplit(file, "/"))[3])
}
```

# Offsite Trial Reporting

## Plot Summaries
```{r echo=FALSE,results="asis"}

for(site in sites) {
  cat("  \n",  site, "  \n")
  trees = read.csv2(paste0("data/trees/", site, "/", year, ".csv"), header = TRUE, sep = ",")
  dim(trees)
  print(trees %>%
    group_by(Plot) %>%
    summarise('Number of Trees'=n()))
}
```
